metadata.title: CVE-2021-45952 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** Dnsmasq 2.86 has a heap-based buffer overflow in dhcp_reply(called from dhcp_packet and FuzzDhcp). NOTE: the vendor's position is thatCVE-2021-45951 through CVE-2021-45957 "do not represent realvulnerabilities, to the best of our knowledge."

criterions.comment: dnsmasq: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
